title: segfault in json-0.11.3, Rust 1.15

labels.name: I-crash
labels.description: Issue: The compiler crashes (SIGSEGV, SIGABRT, etc). Use I-ICE instead when the compiler panics.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

body:
https://github.com/maciejhirsz/json-rust 3bc4e49687bfaa541214d4a3371a543231e18069

I can only repro this on beta, not stable or nightly. Only happens ~10% tries.

```
brian@ip-10-145-43-250:/mnt2/dev⟫ rustc +beta -Vv
rustc 1.15.0-beta.3 (a035041ba 2017-01-07)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: a035041ba450ce3061d78a2bdb9c446eb5321d0d
commit-date: 2017-01-07
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.15.0-beta.3
LLVM version: 3.9
```

